author: LaVache84
notes: The deck revolves around clearing their field/filling your graveyard with Snipehunter and grabbing an Econ/filling your graveyard with Magical Merchant.  Then you special summon BLS or Darkflare, econ take, and win!
main0: Black Luster Soldier - Envoy of the Evening Twilight
main1: Black Luster Soldier - Envoy of the Evening Twilight
